plot: Geoffrey Wedgwood secretly replaces an astronaut & Professor Wedgwood launches Geoffrey into space. "Pathfinders in Space" (1960), "Pathfinders to Mars" (1960), and "Pathfinders to Venus" (1961) are all sequels to "Taget Luna" (1960).
plot_en: Geoffrey Wedgwood secretly replaces an astronaut & Professor Wedgwood launches Geoffrey into space. "Pathfinders in Space" (1960), "Pathfinders to Mars" (1960), and "Pathfinders to Venus" (1961) are all sequels to "Taget Luna" (1960).

title: Target Luna
